timeline.bodyText: Note that in this case valueCounts == nullValueCounts and the count is the same as recordCount.
timeline.author: edgarRd

timeline.message: Adding test for repeated values count on metrics

timeline.bodyText: Nit: should not be left blank or else we get javadoc warnings.
timeline.author: rdblue
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -59,26 +62,56 @@ public Metrics(Long rowCount,
     this.upperBounds = upperBounds;
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Get the number of records (rows) in file.
+   *
+   * @return

timeline.bodyText: All values including nulls and NaN?
timeline.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: Can we also add a reference to the conversion back to a value? And maybe one to the spec for that conversion?
timeline.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: What do you want to test with this case?
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: This test validates the contract that counts include repeated values. In my ORC implementation counts were not included and there was no test validating that contract that now I've documented.
replies.author: edgarRd
